tit.e: Obi ita (cardboard belt to stiffen the obi sash)
Obi ita (cardboard belt to stiffen the obi sash)

sen.j: 帯板（おびいた）とは、帯の形を調えるために使う小物。
sen.e: Obiita means komono (gadget) that is used for arranging the shape of obi (sash).
An obi ita is an accessory used to set the shape of obi (sash).
An obi ita is an accessory used to set the shape of obi (sash).

sen.j: 厚紙などを芯に布を張って作る板状の小物で、帯の前面に挟み込んで使う。
sen.e: It is a plate-like komono that is made by putting cloth on the cardboard-made padding, and people use it by inserting it at the front of obi.
It is a plate-like accessory that is made by putting cloth on the cardboard-made padding, and people use it by inserting it in the front face of obi.
sen.cmt: komono を accessories に修正しました。at the front を in the front face に修正しました。

sen.j: 帯の形を整えるための道具であり、複雑な結び方をしても帯の形が崩れないようになっている。
sen.e: As it is a gadget to arrange the shape of obi, it is devised to keep the shape of obi even when obi is fastened in a complicated manner.

sen.j: 大人の手のひらに余るぐらいの大きさの女児用のものから、帯の前面全体を抑えられる大きさのものまで大きさはさまざま。
sen.e: The size of products varies widely from the one for girls whose size is similar to adults' palm to the one that can press the entire front of obi.

sen.j: 近年はレースが接着されて折り返して帯の縁から見せられるものも登場、着付けの補助具から装飾品のひとつになりつつある。
sen.e: Obiita on which lace is pasted, a product which people can show it from the rim of obi, appeared recently, and it has been becoming a kind of accessories rather than an aid for dressing.
